PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-10602012-08-30,  ,  ,  EC,  HC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectReduction of Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Coal-fired Generation of Electricity Regulations
PrecisREDUCTION OF CARBON DIOXIDE EMISSIONS FROM COAL-FIRED GENERATION OF ELECTRICITY REGULATIONS in order to ensure a permanent transition from high-emitting coal-fired electricity generation to low or non-emitting generation such as renewable energy, high efficiency natural gas, or thermal power with carbon capture and storage.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0167 Publication Date: 2012-09-12
AttachmentsAttachment
